UserSettings.description: A collection of settings that apply to users of Amazon SageMaker Studio. These settings are specified when the CreateUserProfile API is called, and as DefaultUserSettings when the CreateDomain API is called.

properties.name: ExecutionRole
properties.description: The execution role for the user.

type.description: The execution role for the user.

properties.name: JupyterServerAppSettings
properties.description: The Jupyter server's app settings.

type.description: The Jupyter server's app settings.

properties.name: KernelGatewayAppSettings
properties.description: The kernel gateway app settings.

type.description: The kernel gateway app settings.

properties.name: SecurityGroups
properties.description: The security groups for the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that Studio uses for communication.

type.description: The security groups for the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that Studio uses for communication.

properties.name: SharingSettings
properties.description: The sharing settings.

type.description: The sharing settings.

DefaultSpaceSettings.description: A collection of settings that apply to spaces of Amazon SageMaker Studio. These settings are specified when the Create/Update Domain API is called.

properties.name: ExecutionRole
properties.description: The execution role for the space.

type.description: The execution role for the space.

properties.name: JupyterServerAppSettings
properties.description: The Jupyter server's app settings.

type.description: The Jupyter server's app settings.

properties.name: KernelGatewayAppSettings
properties.description: The kernel gateway app settings.

type.description: The kernel gateway app settings.

properties.name: SecurityGroups
properties.description: The security groups for the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that Studio uses for communication.

type.description: The security groups for the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that Studio uses for communication.

properties.name: InstanceType
properties.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.

type.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.

properties.name: SageMakerImageArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker image that the image version belongs to.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker image that the image version belongs to.

properties.name: SageMakerImageVersionArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image version created on the instance.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image version created on the instance.

properties.name: LifecycleConfigArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configuration to attach to the Resource.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lifecycle Configuration to attach to the Resource.

properties.name: CustomImages
properties.description: A list of custom SageMaker images that are configured to run as a KernelGateway app.

type.description: A list of custom SageMaker images that are configured to run as a KernelGateway app.

properties.name: DefaultResourceSpec
properties.description: The default instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the default SageMaker image used by the KernelGateway app.

type.description: The default instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the default SageMaker image used by the KernelGateway app.

properties.name: AppImageConfigName
properties.description: The Name of the AppImageConfig.

type.description: The Name of the AppImageConfig.

properties.name: ImageName
properties.description: The name of the CustomImage. Must be unique to your account.

type.description: The name of the CustomImage. Must be unique to your account.

properties.name: ImageVersionNumber
properties.description: The version number of the CustomImage.

type.description: The version number of the CustomImage.

SharingSettings.description: Specifies options when sharing an Amazon SageMaker Studio notebook. These settings are specified as part of DefaultUserSettings when the CreateDomain API is called, and as part of UserSettings when the CreateUserProfile API is called.

properties.name: NotebookOutputOption
properties.description: Whether to include the notebook cell output when sharing the notebook. The default is Disabled.

type.description: Whether to include the notebook cell output when sharing the notebook. The default is Disabled.

properties.name: S3KmsKeyId
properties.description: When NotebookOutputOption is Allowed, the AWS Key Management Service (KMS) encryption key ID used to encrypt the notebook cell output in the Amazon S3 bucket.

type.description: When NotebookOutputOption is Allowed, the AWS Key Management Service (KMS) encryption key ID used to encrypt the notebook cell output in the Amazon S3 bucket.

properties.name: S3OutputPath
properties.description: When NotebookOutputOption is Allowed, the Amazon S3 bucket used to store the shared notebook snapshots.

type.description: When NotebookOutputOption is Allowed, the Amazon S3 bucket used to store the shared notebook snapshots.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIds
properties.description: The security groups for the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud that the Domain uses for communication between Domain-level apps and user apps.

type.description: The security groups for the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud that the Domain uses for communication between Domain-level apps and user apps.

RStudioServerProDomainSettings.description: A collection of settings that update the current configuration for the RStudioServerPro Domain-level app.

properties.name: DomainExecutionRoleArn
properties.description: The ARN of the execution role for the RStudioServerPro Domain-level app.

type.description: The ARN of the execution role for the RStudioServerPro Domain-level app.

properties.name: RStudioConnectUrl
properties.description: A URL pointing to an RStudio Connect server.

type.description: A URL pointing to an RStudio Connect server.

properties.name: RStudioPackageManagerUrl
properties.description: A URL pointing to an RStudio Package Manager server.

type.description: A URL pointing to an RStudio Package Manager server.

RSessionAppSettings.description: A collection of settings that apply to an RSessionGateway app.

properties.name: CustomImages
properties.description: A list of custom SageMaker images that are configured to run as a KernelGateway app.

type.description: A list of custom SageMaker images that are configured to run as a KernelGateway app.

RStudioServerProAppSettings.description: A collection of settings that configure user interaction with the RStudioServerPro app.

properties.name: AccessStatus
properties.description: Indicates whether the current user has access to the RStudioServerPro app.

type.description: Indicates whether the current user has access to the RStudioServerPro app.

properties.name: UserGroup
properties.description: The level of permissions that the user has within the RStudioServerPro app. This value defaults to User. The Admin value allows the user access to the RStudio Administrative Dashboard.

type.description: The level of permissions that the user has within the RStudioServerPro app. This value defaults to User. The Admin value allows the user access to the RStudio Administrative Dashboard.

properties.name: AppNetworkAccessType
properties.description: Specifies the VPC used for non-EFS traffic. The default value is PublicInternetOnly.

type.description: Specifies the VPC used for non-EFS traffic. The default value is PublicInternetOnly.

properties.name: AuthMode
properties.description: The mode of authentication that members use to access the domain.

type.description: The mode of authentication that members use to access the domain.

properties.name: DefaultUserSettings
properties.description: The default user settings.

type.description: The default user settings.

properties.name: DefaultSpaceSettings
properties.description: The default space settings.

type.description: The default space settings.

properties.name: DomainName
properties.description: A name for the domain.

type.description: A name for the domain.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: SageMaker uses AWS KMS to encrypt the EFS volume attached to the domain with an AWS managed customer master key (CMK) by default.

type.description: SageMaker uses AWS KMS to encrypt the EFS volume attached to the domain with an AWS managed customer master key (CMK) by default.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The VPC subnets that Studio uses for communication.

type.description: The VPC subnets that Studio uses for communication.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of tags to apply to the user profile.

type.description: A list of tags to apply to the user profile.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: The ID of the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that Studio uses for communication.

type.description: The ID of the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that Studio uses for communication.

properties.name: AppSecurityGroupManagement
properties.description: The entity that creates and manages the required security groups for inter-app communication in VPCOnly mode. Required when CreateDomain.AppNetworkAccessType is VPCOnly and DomainSettings.RStudioServerProDomainSettings.DomainExecutionRoleArn is provided.

type.description: The entity that creates and manages the required security groups for inter-app communication in VPCOnly mode. Required when CreateDomain.AppNetworkAccessType is VPCOnly and DomainSettings.RStudioServerProDomainSettings.DomainExecutionRoleArn is provided.

properties.name: DomainArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created domain.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created domain.

properties.name: Url
properties.description: The URL to the created domain.

type.description: The URL to the created domain.

properties.name: DomainId
properties.description: The domain name.

type.description: The domain name.

properties.name: HomeEfsFileSystemId
properties.description: The ID of the Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) managed by this Domain.

type.description: The ID of the Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) managed by this Domain.

properties.name: SingleSignOnManagedApplicationInstanceId
properties.description: The SSO managed application instance ID.

type.description: The SSO managed application instance ID.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIdForDomainBoundary
properties.description: The ID of the security group that authorizes traffic between the RSessionGateway apps and the RStudioServerPro app.

type.description: The ID of the security group that authorizes traffic between the RSessionGateway apps and the RStudioServerPro app.
